# 1. Reading in the data

```{r}
library(readr)
mcdevitt <- read_csv("~/COS/McDevitt/Final_Data_for_Replication.csv")
head(mcdevitt)
```


# 2. Main regression (OLS)


```{r}
library(estimatr)
library(tidyverse)
reg = lm(complaints ~ first_a, data=mcdevitt)
summary(reg)
head(tidy(reg)[2,1:5])
```
